story.author: Maximus79
story.headline: Experts claim that movies with horses generate 9.8% more revenue than movies with cats

article.p: A study by certified movie experts found that movies that include a horse as a character generate 9.8% more revenue than movies with a cat.

Surprisingly, the study found that movies that include a turtle make the most money.
However, psychic experts suggests tampering from the giant space turtle who's dreams compose our reality. Maybe.
